body.p:
Elkton Jan 12 1864
Col B. F. Bristoe
Dear Sir

At the last term of the court Three hundred dollars I was fined Three hundred dollars on a charge of having violated a Tavern Lisens Bond I am in solvent have a family five Children had my hous Burnt 12 months ago with a loss of allmost Everything we had I would humbly ask your assistance in presenting the inclosed petition by attending to this you will ever have my good feelings
